displayProperties.description:
Cast your Super to grant Overshield to nearby allies. 

Casting your Barricade grants Overshield to yourself and nearby allies and empowers it, enabling it to slowly regenerate the Overshield of allies bunkering behind it and extend their Overshield duration.
displayProperties.name: Bastion

displayProperties.description:
Cast your rift to create a Void Soul. When you damage a target with a weapon, your Void Soul flies to them and drains them, doing damage and weakening them.

When a target is being drained, you are granted grenade and melee energy (if running healing rift) or health (if running empowering rift).

Defeating a target who is being drained by your Void Soul grants class ability energy.
displayProperties.name: Child of the Old Gods

displayProperties.description: Dodging makes you invisible.
displayProperties.name: Vanishing Step

displayProperties.description:
Defeating a weakened, suppressed, or volatile target grants Invisibility and Truesight.

After performing a Stylish Execution, your next melee attack while invisible weakens targets.
displayProperties.name: Stylish Executioner

displayProperties.description:
Activate Quickfall to spend your melee charge and dive to the ground, creating a large smoke cloud on impact, which then dissipates. Targets caught in the cloud are weakened, and allies are made invisible.

Your Smoke Bomb makes nearby allies invisible when it attaches to nearby surfaces or targets.
displayProperties.name: Trapper's Ambush

displayProperties.description:
Defeat a target with a Void ability to activate Devour.

While Devour is active, final blows restore health and extend Devour.
displayProperties.name: Feed the Void

displayProperties.description:
[Grenade] : Hold to overcharge your grenade, making it deadlier and more effective.

Vortex Grenade: Increases the size and linger duration of the vortex.

Axion Bolt: Creates an additional seeker.

Scatter Grenade: Has submunitions track to nearby targets.

Magnetic Grenade: Releases a short-range Void blast.
displayProperties.name: Chaos Accelerant

displayProperties.description: Hitting a target with a Void ability or Volatile explosion makes them volatile. Further damage to a volatile target causes them to explode. Grants you and nearby allies health when volatile targets explode near you.

displayProperties.description:
While you have an Overshield or are inside Ward of Dawn, your grenade charges significantly faster, you have increased melee range and damage, and melee final blows extend the duration of your Overshield.

You gain an additional shield throw while in Sentinel Shield.

displayProperties.description: Your Void grenades weaken targets.

displayProperties.description: Melee final blows start health regeneration for you and nearby allies.

Defeating suppressed targets creates a Void Breach.

displayProperties.description: Finisher final blows grant Invisibility.

displayProperties.description:
Step between dimensions to subvert the laws of physics.

[Super Secondary]  : Teleport a short distance.

[Super Primary]  : Unleash a deadly Void eruption. A fully charged attack makes targets volatile.
displayProperties.name: Nova Warp

displayProperties.description:
Hurl an explosive bolt of Void Light at a target, disintegrating those caught within its blast.

Nova Bomb creates a singularity that pulls targets inward and continually damages those trapped inside.
displayProperties.name: Nova Bomb: Vortex

displayProperties.description:
Hurl an explosive bolt of Void Light at a target, disintegrating those caught within its blast.

Nova Bomb travels slowly and seeks targets. Detonations shatter into smaller seeker projectiles.

displayProperties.name: Ward of Dawn

[Super]  : Summon a shield of Void Light. 
While Sentinel Shield is active:
[Light Attack]  : Attack.
[Block]  : Block.
[Grenade]  : Perform a Shield Throw.

Guard with Sentinel Shield to create a defensive wall. Allies who shoot through the wall have increased weapon damage, and guarding allies makes the shield last longer.
displayProperties.name: Sentinel Shield

displayProperties.description:
Tether foes to a Void Anchor, weakening and suppressing them for you and your allies.

The Void Anchors fired from Shadowshot pull targets toward the impact point, which then become traps and wait for prey. Void Anchors have increased range and last longer.
displayProperties.name: Shadowshot: Deadfall

displayProperties.description:
Summon a pair of deadly Void blades and stalk the battlefield in a veil of shadows.

[Light Attack]  : Perform a quick melee attack.

[Heavy Attack]  : Perform a heavy attack that weakens your target, and once again vanish from sight.
displayProperties.name: Spectral Blades

displayProperties.description:
Tether foes to a Void Anchor, weakening and suppressing them for you and your allies.

Fire two volleys of three Void Arrows that seek nearby targets. Shadowshot makes targets volatile and deals increased damage to tethered targets. Defeating tethered targets creates Orbs of Power.
displayProperties.name: Shadowshot: Moebius Quiver

displayProperties.description: Adds a neo-capsule appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.description: Adds a Lucent Hive Shrieker to your transmat effects.

Form a staff of pure Arc energy and acrobatically take out your foes.

[Block] : Hold to deflect incoming projectiles with your Arc staff.

Hurl your Arc Staff forward, embedding it into surfaces or large targets and jolting nearby targets.

After a short time, a devastating lightning bolt strikes the staff, overcharging it with Arc energy. While overcharged, your staff discharges lightning at nearby foes.
displayProperties.name: Gathering Storm

displayProperties.description:
Supercharge your fists and slam the ground with the force of a maelstrom. While active:

[Light Attack]  : Quickly charge forward, dealing damage to any impacted targets.

[Heavy Attack] : Slam your fists to the ground, blinding targets and dealing damage in an area around you, leaving aftershocks in your wake. Performing a slam from the air deals additional damage.

displayProperties.description: Hurtle through the air like a missile and crash into targets to inflict meteoric damage.

[Sprint]  : Teleport forward, consuming a small amount of Super energy.
displayProperties.name: Stormtrance

displayProperties.description:
Unleash a long-range channeled beam of concentrated Arc energy. Sustained damage on a single target creates a jolting lightning strike at their position.

 [Super]  while active to deactivate your Super early, saving Super energy.

Pulse Grenade: Creates Ionic Traces periodically as it damages targets and increases in damage over time.

Lightning Grenade: Grants an additional grenade charge, and jolts targets hit by the initial blast.

Storm Grenade: After detonating, creates a roaming thundercloud that tracks nearby targets and fires bolts of lightning at foes beneath it.

While amplified, the shield blocks significantly more damage before breaking.

Defeating targets with melee attacks starts health regeneration and makes you amplified.

While you are amplified, your dodge recharges more quickly, you are more resilient while dodging, and your reload speed is greatly increased.

Damaging any jolted target with melee attacks also blinds them.

Defeating targets with Arc abilities or defeating jolted or blinded targets creates an Ionic Trace.

Collecting an Ionic Trace makes you amplified.

While amplified, your Arc Souls are supercharged and gain increased fire rate.

Scout Rifles you are wielding fire shield-piercing rounds, which bypass combatant defenses.

Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

displayProperties.description: Damaging a Champion with an Arc ability causes the Champion to become jolted.

Arc grenades disrupt combatants, stunning them and delaying ability regeneration, and lower combatant damage output.

Solar melee abilities stun unshielded combatants.

displayProperties.description: Dealing precision damage to combatants affected by Arc debuffs spawns an Ionic Trace.

displayProperties.description: After throwing an Arc grenade, gain increased grenade recharge for a short time. Arc final blows extend the duration of this benefit.

displayProperties.description: Rapid precision hits against distant combatants weaken them for a short duration.
displayProperties.name: Sundering Glare

displayProperties.description: After being invisible, your Void weapons gain Volatile Rounds. Finishers while invisible grant bonus damage for all weapons and a reserve overshield for allies.

displayProperties.description: Gain melee energy and create lightning strikes with Thunderclap.

displayProperties.description: Improved ionic traces

displayProperties.description: Hip shots fire widespread. Final blows generate Ionic Traces.

displayProperties.description: Ionic Traces load a jolting round.
displayProperties.name: Tempest Cascade

displayProperties.description: Land multiple hits to fire homing micro-rockets.
displayProperties.name: Rocket Tracers

displayProperties.description: Landing multiple rockets loads a grenade. [Alternate Weapon Action]  to switch into Grenade Launcher mode.
displayProperties.name: Grenade Chaser

displayProperties.description: This weapon's damage type becomes Strand. Final blows with grenades from this weapon create Tangles.
displayProperties.name: Nano-entanglement

displayProperties.description: Final round drains life force to deal extra damage.
displayProperties.name: Touch of Malice

displayProperties.description: Precision hits drain combatants' life force and charge up a ball of Darkness. [Alternate Weapon Action]  and then fire to unleash the blight projectile, shrouding combatants in Darkness and temporarily blinding them.
displayProperties.name: Charged with Blight

displayProperties.description: Causing a lightning strike with this weapon partially reloads the magazine from reserves.
displayProperties.name: Return Stroke

displayProperties.description: Collecting an Ionic Trace partially reloads the magazine from reserves.
displayProperties.name: Ionic Interment

displayProperties.description: Aiming down sights increases body shot damage, decreases target acquisition.
displayProperties.name: Gutshot Straight

displayProperties.description: Aiming down sights increases body shot damage but decreases target acquisition slightly.
displayProperties.name: Gutshot Straight

displayProperties.description: Significantly increases handling, significantly decreases target acquisition.
displayProperties.name: Slickdraw

displayProperties.description: Significantly increases handling, decreases target acquisition.
displayProperties.name: Slickdraw

displayProperties.description: Deals bonus damage to targets with overshields. Deals a small amount of bonus damage to combatant shields.
displayProperties.name: Under-Over

displayProperties.description: Deals improved bonus damage to targets with overshields. Deals a small amount of bonus damage to combatant shields.
displayProperties.name: Under-Over

displayProperties.description:
Final blows with this weapon generate melee energy. 
Dealing melee damage briefly improves this weapon's handling.
displayProperties.name: Pugilist

displayProperties.description:
Final blows with this weapon generate improved melee energy. 
Dealing melee damage briefly improves this weapon's handling.
displayProperties.name: Pugilist

displayProperties.description: Reloading this weapon after defeating a target overcharges this weapon for a short period of time, causing it to jolt on its next hit.
displayProperties.name: Voltshot

displayProperties.description: Reloading this weapon after defeating a target overcharges this weapon for an improved short period of time, causing it to jolt on its next hit.
displayProperties.name: Voltshot

Switching to this weapon while you are damaged strongly increases its handling for a short duration.

Swords gain increased charge speed, guard resistance, and guard endurance instead.
displayProperties.name: Hot Swap

displayProperties.description: Reloading near allies overflows the magazine.
displayProperties.name: Runneth Over

displayProperties.description: Reloading near allies overflows the magazine an improved amount.

displayProperties.description:
Dealing melee damage gives this weapon increased target acquisition and range for a short period of time.
Dealing melee damage again extends the effect.
displayProperties.name: Right Hook

displayProperties.description: Adds a cannon appearance to your transmat effects.
displayProperties.name: Cannon Fodder

displayProperties.description: Adds an Awoken pointillistic appearance to your transmat effects.
displayProperties.name: Dreaming Shimmer

displayProperties.description: Adds a pumpkin appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.description: Adds a treasure chest appearance to your transmat effects.
displayProperties.name: Thar Be Treasure!

displayProperties.description: Adds a rainbow appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.description:
Defeat targets with abilities, Solar debuffs, or Solar weapons to charge up an improvised Solar explosive.

[Grenade]  : Throw a solar explosive that can be shot in mid-air to cause an ignition.
displayProperties.name: Gunpowder Gamble

displayProperties.description:
Your Solar Supers are enhanced. Deadshot Golden Gun has damage resistance, Marksman Golden Gun has increased duration, and Blade Barrage launches more projectiles.

While radiant, final blows with your equipped Throwing Knife fully refund your melee energy.
displayProperties.name: Knock 'Em Down

displayProperties.description:
Precision final blows grant you and nearby allies increased weapon handling and reload speed for a short duration. Stacks 3 times.

Activating your class ability immediately grants maximum stacks of On Your Mark.
displayProperties.name: On Your Mark

displayProperties.description:
While sliding, activate your charged melee ability to launch a wave of [Solar] Solar energy forward, damaging and scorching targets in front of you as you leap into the air.

While airborne, activate your charged melee again to slam to the ground and create a second larger wave of damaging [Solar] Solar energy. If the wave hits a scorched target, they ignite.
displayProperties.name: Consecration

displayProperties.description: Final blows with [Solar] Solar abilities or ignitions increase the damage of your Solar abilities. Stacks 3 times.
displayProperties.name: Roaring Flames

displayProperties.description:
Solar ability final blows, Hammer of Sol impacts, and defeating scorched targets creates Sunspots. Your abilities regenerate faster, and your Super drains more slowly while standing in a Sunspot.

Sunspots apply scorch and deal damage to targets inside. Entering a Sunspot applies restoration.
displayProperties.name: Sol Invictus

displayProperties.description:
[Air Move]  : Dodge quickly while airborne.

While Heat Rises is active, you have an additional dodge.

While airborne, rapidly defeating targets with your Super or weapon grants Cure to you.
displayProperties.name: Icarus Dash

displayProperties.description:
You can fire weapons, melee, and throw grenades while gliding.

[Grenade]  : Hold to activate Heat Rises, consuming your grenade.

Final blows while airborne increase the duration of Heat Rises and grant melee energy.
displayProperties.name: Heat Rises

displayProperties.description:
Your Healing, Solar, Firebolt, and Fusion Grenades have enhanced functionality.

Healing Grenade: Improves the strength of cure and restoration effects applied.

Solar Grenade: Increases linger duration. Periodically emits blobs of lava around its perimeter.

Firebolt Grenade: Increases target search radius and maximum target count.

Fusion Grenade: Explodes twice.
displayProperties.name: Touch of Flame

displayProperties.description:
Defeat targets with abilities, Solar debuffs, or Solar weapons to charge up an improvised Solar explosive.

[Grenade]  : Throw a solar explosive that can be shot in mid-air to cause an ignition.
displayProperties.name: Gunpowder Gamble

displayProperties.description: Your class ability recharges faster when you scorch targets.
displayProperties.name: Ember of Singeing

displayProperties.description: Applying restoration, cure,  or radiant to allies grants increased grenade, melee, and class ability regeneration for a short duration.
displayProperties.name: Ember of Benevolence
